com.pddstudio.networkutils.interfaces

Interface DiscoveryCallback

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleDiscoveryListener

    public interface DiscoveryCallback
    The interface used by the DiscoveryService to deliver callbacks.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDiscoveryFailed(int errorCode)
      Gets invoked in case the DiscoveryService couldn't start or failed to start.
      void onServiceFound(NsdServiceInfo nsdServiceInfo)
      Gets invoked as soon as the DiscoveryService found a service for the requested lookup parameter.
      void onServiceLost(NsdServiceInfo nsdServiceInfo)
      Gets invoked as soon as the DiscoveryService lost a service for the requested lookup parameter.
      void onStartDiscovery()
      Gets invoked as soon as the DiscoveryService started looking up for requested services.
      void onStopDiscovery()
      Gets invoked as soon as the DiscoveryService stops looking up for requested services.

    • Method Detail
